comments:
I get this message when I select the last 2 methods in my class and press 
ctrl+X.
It's very hard to reproduce this. It occured only 2 times so far. 
But i hope the stack trace helps you to find the error.

FH, please look at this and work with the JDT guys to find out if the problem 
is ours.  It looks like they are simply indexing out of range sometimes, in 
which case, move it to them.

Not sure how to help them in this case. 

JavaEditor$MouseClickListener.getMinimum
Location is calling StyledText.getLocationAtOffset with an offset out of range.
It must be something like the text is about to change or has just changed (it 
runs inside the paint callback which run inside the textChange callback) and 
the charCount in StyledText is different from the charCount in JavaEditor.

What would really help them is step to reproduce the problem.

I suggest to move to 3.1 M4 which no longer exhibits this bug.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 76890 ***
